## Workshop Description

This workshop, **GIS for Fisheries and Wildlife Sciences**, provides a general introduction to GIS data, workflows, and programming. No prior GIS experience is assumed, but might be helpful when following the more advanced portions of this workshop. Other high-level coding languages (e.g., Python and R) will also be included.

### Objectives:

-   Provide an overview of GIS concepts and data types
-   Introduce ArcGIS Pro (interface, projects, resources)
-   Demonstrate common spatial operations and tools
-   Work through an example of programmatic GIS (python)
-   Explore a variety of other tools and integrations
